Class Payment

java.lang.Object
Payment
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable<Payment>
public class Payment
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Payment>
A class to represent a payment of the tax on a property.

    • Payment

      public Payment​(int year, double amount, boolean paid)
      Parameters:
      year - The year the property tax payment was due.
      amount - The amount due for the payment.
      paid - Whether or not the payment has been made.

    • writeToFile

      A method to write a payment object to the payment_info.csv file.
      Parameters:

    • removePayment

      public void removePayment​(java.lang.String postcode) throws java.io.IOException
      A method to remove a payment from the system if it gets updated. Works by making a copy of the file and copying all data except the target line to the copy.
      Parameters:
      postcode - The postcode associated with the payment.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException
